verses.verse: Now it happened in the thirtieth<WH7970> year,<WH8141> in the fourth<WH7243> month,<WH2568> in the fifth of the month,<WH2320> as I was among<WH8432> the captives<WH1473> by the river<WH5104> Chebar,<WH3529> that the heavens<WH8064> were opened,<WH6605> and I saw<WH7200> visions<WH4759> of God.<WH430>
In the fifth<WH2568> of the month,<WH2320> which was the fifth<WH2549> year<WH8141> of king<WH4428> Jehoiachin<WH3112>'s captivity,<WH1546>

the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came expressly to Ezekiel<WH3168> the priest,<WH3548> the son<WH1121> of Buzi,<WH941> in the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans<WH3778> by the river<WH5104> Chebar;<WH3529> and the hand<WH3027> of Yahweh was there on him.<WH3068>

I looked,<WH7200> and behold,<WH7307> a stormy wind came<WH935> out of the north,<WH6828> a great<WH1419> cloud,<WH6051> with flashing<WH784> lightning,<WH3947> and a brightness<WH5051> around<WH5439> it,<WH8432> and out of its midst as it were glowing<WH5869> metal,<WH2830> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire.<WH784>
Out of its midst<WH8432> came the likeness<WH1823> of four<WH702> living creatures.<WH2416> This was their appearance:<WH4758> they<WH2007> had the likeness<WH1823> of a man.<WH120>
Everyone<WH259> had four<WH702> faces,<WH6440> and each one<WH259> of them had four<WH702> wings.<WH3671>

Their feet<WH7272> were straight<WH3477> feet;<WH7272> and the sole<WH3709> of their feet<WH7272> was like the sole<WH3709> of a calf<WH5695>'s foot;<WH7272> and they sparkled<WH5340> like<WH5869> burnished<WH7044> brass.<WH5178>
They had the hands<WH3027> of a man<WH120> under their wings<WH3671> on their four<WH702> sides;<WH7253> and the four<WH702> of them had their faces<WH6440> and their wings thus:<WH3671>
their wings<WH3671> were joined<WH2266> one<WH802> to another;<WH269> they didn't<WH5437> turn when they went;<WH3212> each one<WH376> went<WH3212> straight<WH5676> forward.<WH6440>

As for the likeness<WH1823> of their faces,<WH6440> they had the face<WH6440> of a man;<WH120> and the four<WH702> of them had the face<WH6440> of a lion<WH738> on the right side;<WH3225> and the four<WH702> of them had the face<WH6440> of an ox<WH7794> on the left side;<WH8040> the four<WH702> of them also had the face<WH6440> of an eagle.<WH5404>

Such were their faces.<WH6440> Their wings<WH3671> were spread<WH6504> out above.<WH4605> Two<WH8147> wings of each<WH376> one<WH376> touched<WH2266> another,<WH376> and two<WH8147> covered<WH3680> their bodies.<WH1472>
Each one<WH376> went<WH3212> straight<WH5676> forward:<WH6440> where the spirit<WH7307> was to go,<WH3212> they went;<WH3212> they didn't<WH5437> turn when they went.<WH3212>

As for the likeness<WH1823> of the living creatures,<WH2416> their appearance<WH4758> was like burning<WH1197> coals<WH1513> of fire,<WH784> like the appearance<WH4758> of torches:<WH3940> the fire went up and down<WH1980> among the living creatures;<WH2416> and the fire<WH784> was bright,<WH5051> and out of the fire<WH784> went forth<WH3318> lightning.<WH1300>
The living creatures<WH2416> ran<WH7519> and returned<WH7725> as the appearance<WH4758> of a flash of lightning.<WH965>
Now as I saw<WH7200> the living creatures,<WH2416> behold,<WH259> one wheel<WH212> on the earth<WH776> beside<WH681> the living creatures,<WH2416> for each of the four<WH702> faces of it.<WH6440>

The appearance<WH4758> of the wheels<WH212> and their work<WH4639> was like<WH5869> a beryl:<WH8658> and the four<WH702> of them had one<WH259> likeness;<WH1823> and their appearance<WH4758> and their work<WH4639> was as it were a wheel<WH212> within<WH8432> a wheel.<WH212>
When they went,<WH3212> they went<WH3212> in their four<WH702> directions:<WH7253> they didn't<WH5437> turn when they went.<WH3212>
As for their rims,<WH1354> they were high<WH1363> and dreadful;<WH3374> and the four<WH702> of them had their rims<WH1354> full<WH4392> of eyes<WH5869> all around.<WH5439>

When the living creatures<WH2416> went,<WH3212> the wheels<WH212> went<WH3212> beside them;<WH681> and when the living creatures<WH2416> were lifted up<WH5375> from the earth,<WH776> the wheels<WH212> were lifted up.<WH5375>

Wherever the spirit<WH7307> was to go,<WH3212> they went;<WH3212> there was the spirit<WH7307> to go:<WH3212> and the wheels<WH212> were lifted up<WH5375> beside<WH5980> them;<WH7307> for the spirit of the living creature<WH2416> was in the wheels.<WH212>

When those went,<WH3212> these went;<WH3212> and when those stood,<WH5975> these stood;<WH5975> and when those were lifted up<WH5375> from the earth,<WH776> the wheels<WH212> were lifted up<WH5375> beside<WH5980> them:<WH7307> for the spirit of the living creature<WH2416> was in the wheels.<WH212>

Over the head<WH7218> of the living creature<WH2416> there was the likeness<WH1823> of an expanse,<WH7549> like<WH5869> the awesome<WH3372> crystal<WH7140> to look on,<WH5186> stretched forth over their heads<WH7218> above.<WH4605>

Under the expanse<WH7549> were their wings<WH3671> straight,<WH3477> the one<WH802> toward the other:<WH269> each one<WH376> had two<WH8147> which covered<WH3680> on this side,<WH2007> and every one<WH376> had two<WH8147> which covered<WH3680> on that side,<WH2007> their bodies.<WH1472>

When they went,<WH3212> I heard<WH8085> the noise<WH6963> of their wings<WH3671> like the noise<WH6963> of great<WH7227> waters,<WH4325> like the voice<WH6963> of the Almighty,<WH7706> a noise<WH6963> of tumult<WH1999> like the noise<WH6963> of an army:<WH4264> when they stood,<WH5975> they let down<WH7503> their wings.<WH3671>
There was a voice<WH6963> above the expanse<WH7549> that was over their heads:<WH7218> when they stood,<WH5975> they let down<WH7503> their wings.<WH3671>

Above<WH4605> the expanse<WH7549> that was over their heads<WH7218> was the likeness<WH1823> of a throne,<WH3678> as the appearance<WH4758> of a sapphire<WH5601> stone;<WH68> and on the likeness<WH1823> of the throne<WH3678> was a likeness<WH1823> as the appearance<WH4758> of a man<WH120> on it above.<WH4605>

I saw<WH7200> as it were glowing<WH5869> metal,<WH2830> as the appearance<WH4758> of fire<WH784> within<WH1004> it all around,<WH5439> from the appearance<WH4758> of his waist<WH4975> and upward;<WH4605> and from the appearance<WH4758> of his waist<WH4975> and downward<WH4295> I saw<WH7200> as it were the appearance<WH4758> of fire,<WH784> and there was brightness<WH5051> around him.<WH5439>

As the appearance<WH4758> of the rainbow<WH7198> that is in the cloud<WH6051> in the day<WH3117> of rain,<WH1653> so was the appearance<WH4758> of the brightness<WH5051> all around.<WH5439> This was the appearance<WH4758> of the likeness<WH1823> of the glory<WH3519> of Yahweh.<WH3068> When I saw<WH7200> it,<WH5307> I fell on my face,<WH6440> and I heard<WH8085> a voice<WH6963> of one that spoke.<WH1696>
